They had also live event, singers and dancers all evening. They even played international musics so we could sing together and dance even ü•≥

The overall experience exceeded our expectations. Thank you for hosting us for this memorable dinner! ü§ó

This is a good place to enjoy Bulgarian cuisine and traditional dance. Food taste delicious and there dancing performances every day from 8pm onwards. Please book in advance and anticipate 5 euros per pax for the entrance charges.best ever pork ribs I have tried!

The food is good,and the atmosphere is super good!!! they have bulgarian singer and folk dance performances,even we can dance with them! Dancing with you guys is super nice,I was a folk dancer too. I made  very good memories here. Thank you –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è Ë¨ùË¨ùfrom Taiwan

Our local guide recommend this place for dinner, good choice. Start from 8pm there is a live show. First it was a singer lady then traditional dancing performance. What a good opportunity to watch and it was fun. Food tastes amazing, we had shopska salad, sarmi, parlenka and khawarma. It was so good. Desserts not so good we had the yoghurt with honey and nuts( too healthy i guess) and the chocolate cake is actually lava cake with ice cream not so special.

There is live music starting at 8pm and a 30+ minutes traditional dance routine starting around 8:30pm . The decorations all look very traditional giving the place a cool and cozy atmosphere, food was great!!  100% recommended
